entry.title: Saturday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 18 with temperature falling to 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of drizzle early this morning. Fog patches retreating to the coast this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 18 with temperature falling to 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 28 May 2016
